channel.title: web开发笔记 – Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on web开发笔记

item.title: Docs: Vue短信倒计时
item.description:
<div id="app">
  <button @click="send" :disabled="timer<60">
    {{timer==60 ? '发送短信验证码': `(${timer})后再获取`}}
  </button>
</div>
<script src="../js/vue.js"></script>
<script>
  var vm = new Vue({
    el: "#app",
    data: { timer: 60 },
    methods: {
      send() {
        if (this.timer == 60) {
          this.timer--;
          var t = setInterval(() => {
            if (this.timer > 0) {
              this.timer--;
            } else {
              this.timer = 60;
              clearInterval(t);
            }
          }, 1000);
        }
      }
    }
  });
</script>

item.title: Docs: vue分页演示
item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="ie=edge" />
    <title>分页</title>
    <style>
      ul{
        list-style: none;
      }
      ul > li {
        float: left;
        border: 1px solid blue;
        margin: 0 5px;
        padding: 5px 10px;
        cursor: pointer;
      }
      ul > li.active {
        background-color: lightgreen;
      }
      ul > li.disabled {
        background-color: lightgrey;
      }
    </style>
  </head>
  <body>
    <div id="app">
      <p>当前页:{{pno}}</p>
      <ul @click="change">
        <li :class="pno==1 && 'disabled'">上一页</li>
        <li v-for="i of pcount" :key="i" :class="pno==i && 'active'">{{i}}</li>
        <li :class="pno==pcount && 'disabled'">下一页</li>
      </ul>
    </div>
    <script src="../js/vue.js"></script>
    <script>
      var vm = new Vue({
        el: "#app",
        data: { pno: 1, pcount: 5 },
        methods: {
          change(e) {
            if(e.target.nodeName!='LI') return;
            var p = e.target.innerHTML;
            switch (p) {
              case "上一页":
                this.pno > 1 && this.pno--;
                break;
              case "下一页":
                this.pno < this.pcount && this.pno++;
                break;
              default:
                this.pno = parseInt(p);
            }
          }
        }
      });
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

item.title: Docs: Vue双向绑定
item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Document</title>
</head>
<body>
  <div id="app">
    <h2 v-html="msg"></h2>
    <input type="text" v-model:value="kwords" @keydown.13='search' :placeholder="placeholder">
    <button @click="search">百度一下</button>
  </div>
  <script src="../js/vue.js"></script>
  <script>
    var vm = new Vue({
      el: '#app',
      data: { 
       msg: `<span>百度</span>`,
       kwords:'',
       placeholder:'请输入关键词'
       },
      methods: {
        search(){
          console.log(`你搜索的是：${this.kwords}`);
        }
      },

    })
  </script>
</body>
</html>

item.title: Docs: vue底层原理
item.description:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8" />
    <title>vue底层原理</title>
  </head>
  <body>
    <ol id="nav">
      <li>
        <ul>
          <li>用户名:</li>
          <li>{{uname}}</li>
          <li>积分:</li>
          <li>{{score}}</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
      <li>
        <ul>
          <li>用户名:</li>
          <li>{{uname}}</li>
          <li>积分:</li>
          <li>{{score}}</li>
        </ul>
      </li>
    </ol>
    <script>
      var data = {
        uname: "小李",
        score: 3000
      };
      var arr = []; //保存虚拟dom
      function getChildren(parent) {
        var children = parent.children;
        for (var c of children) {
          if (c.children.length > 0) {
            arguments.callee(c);
          } else {
            for (var d in data) {
              if (c.innerHTML == `{{${d}}}`) {
                c.innerHTML = data[d];
                arr.push({ ele: c, d });
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
      var nav = document.getElementById("nav");
      getChildren(nav);
      Object.defineProperties(data, {
        _uname: {
          value: data.uname,
          writable: true,
          enumerable: false
        },
        uname: {
          get() {
            return this._uname;
          },
          set(value) {
            this._uname = value;
            for (var obj of arr) {
              if (obj.d == "uname") {
                obj.ele.innerHTML = value;
              }
            }
          },
          enumerable: true
        },
        _score: {
          value: data.score,
          writable: true,
          enumerable: false
        },
        score: {
          get() {
            return this._score;
          },
          set(value) {
            this._score = value;
            for (var obj of arr) {
              if (obj.d == "score") {
                obj.ele.innerHTML = value;
              }
            }
          },
          enumerable: true
        }
      });
      Object.seal(data);
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
